name: bespokelabs/Bespoke-Stratos-17k
description: Bespoke-Stratos-17k is a cutting-edge reasoning dataset meticulously crafted by replicating and refining the Berkeley Sky-T1 data pipeline with SFT distillation data from DeepSeek-R1. Comprising questions, reasoning traces, and answers, this dataset is invaluable for training high-capacity reasoning models. Some notable examples include the Bespoke-Stratos-32B and Bespoke-Stratos-7B, both fine-tuned from the Qwen-2.5 family of models.
citeAs: @misc{bespoke_stratos,       author = {Bespoke Labs},       title = {Bespoke-Stratos: The unreasonable effectiveness of reasoning distillation},       howpublished = {https://www.bespokelabs.ai/blog/bespoke-stratos-the-unreasonable-effectiveness-of-reasoning-distillation},       note = {Accessed: 2025-01-22},       year = {2025} }
creator: bespokelabs
keywords: curator, Synthetic, Reasoning, Deep learning model training data
